s.text: The current lawsuit would have Microsoft ignore the most important recent development in computing--the Internet--by shipping a version of Windows that omits the critical Internet capabilities.
The current lawsuit would have Microsoft ignore the most important recent development in computing--the Internet--by shipping a version of Windows that omits the critical Internet capabilities.
The current lawsuit would have Microsoft ignore the most important recent development in computing--the Internet--by shipping a version of Windows that omits the critical Internet capabilities.

The NYT fronts a news analysis predicting that the most likely Microsoft breakup scenario would be along product lines: One company would make Windows, another would make application software such as Microsoft Office, and the third would handle Internet applications.
The current lawsuit would have Microsoft ignore the most important recent development in computing--the Internet--by shipping a version of Windows that omits the critical Internet capabilities.

TP is reminded of the Saturday Night Live skit featuring 1,000 different ways to spell Col.
